original_text: When Jesus therefore saw her weeping, and the Jews also weeping which came with her, he groaned in the spirit, and was troubled.
korean_text: 예수께서 그가 우는 것과 또 함께 온 유대인들이 우는 것을 보시고 심령에 비통히 여기시고 불쌍히 여기사

sentences.original_text: When Jesus therefore saw her weeping
and the Jews also weeping which came with her
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀와 함께 온 유대인들도 우는 것을 보시고
